description: Manage the metadata for file system.

commands.name: az storage fs metadata show
commands.summary: Return all user-defined metadata for the specified file system.
commands.syntax:
az storage fs metadata show --name
                            [--account-key]
                            [--account-name]
                            [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                            [--blob-endpoint]
                            [--connection-string]
                            [--sas-token]
                            [--timeout]
examples: az storage fs metadata show -n myfilesystem --account-name myadlsaccount --account-key 0000-0000

commands.name: az storage fs metadata update
commands.summary: Sets one or more user-defined name-value pairs for the specified file system.
commands.syntax:
az storage fs metadata update --metadata
                              --name
                              [--account-key]
                              [--account-name]
                              [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                              [--blob-endpoint]
                              [--connection-string]
                              [--sas-token]
                              [--timeout]
